text:
@karenandrewsmp @smh Such a big list to choose from.
Georgina Downer. Bronwyn Bishop.  Andrew Bolt. Really smart people.
That chef Peter Evans would be a great choice. Looking for a bit of extra work now. He knows how to cure coronavirus. 
Or maybe someone from IPA.
